Joseph E. Bernard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_E._Bernard 0 Joseph E. Bernard (June 1, 1880 – October 18, 1958), also billed as Joe Bernard and Joseph Bernard, was an American character actor of the 1930s and 1940s. Joseph_E._Bernard ( June_1 , 1880 – October_18_,_1958 ) , also billed as Joe_Bernard and Joseph_Bernard , was an_American_character_actor of the_1930s_and_1940s .
